name: CustomizeListSignupForm
description:
Customize a list's default signup form in Mailchimp.

Use this tool to modify the default signup form for a specific list in Mailchimp's marketing platform. Ideal for tailoring signup forms to better match branding or collect specific user information.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Mailchimp list to customize the signup form.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: signup_form_customization_options
parameters.description: A JSON object containing header settings, body content, and styles for the signup form. It includes header image details, content sections like signup messages, and style properties for elements such as buttons and backgrounds.

image_link.description: The URL that the header image will link to.

header.description: Options for customizing your signup form header.

selector.description: A string that identifies the element selector.

property.description: A string that identifies the property.

value.description: A string that identifies value of the property.

options.description: A collection of options for a selector.

styles.description: An array of objects, each representing an element style for the signup form.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

image_link.description: The URL that the header image will link to.

header.description: Options for customizing your signup form header.

selector.description: A string that identifies the element selector.

property.description: A string that identifies the property.

value.description: A string that identifies value of the property.

options.description: A collection of options for a selector.

styles.description: An array of objects, each representing an element style for the signup form.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
